item.title: My Xpirit Magazine Articles
item.description: My articles regarding Azure Virtual Desktop and Azure Landing Zones are in the Xpirit Magazine #13. In this blog, I’m explaining how my daily job tasks got an epic place in the Xpirit Magazine!
